Reception given by Egyptian ambassador
articles.content:
Reception given by Egyptian ambassador
      Pyongyang, July 21 (KCNA) -- Mahmoud Mohamed Farag Zain, ambassador of the Arab Republic of Egypt to the DPRK, on July 20 gave a reception at the embassy on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the July 23 Revolution, the national holiday of the Egyptian people.
   Invited to the reception were vice-President Yang Hyong Sop of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Minister of Education Pyon Yong Rip who is also chairman of the Korea-Egypt friendship association, vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, vice-Minister of Foreign Trade Kim Pong Ik and other officials concerned.      
   Speeches were made there.
